message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DL

This paper deals with the task of identifying translated texts, which is a common problem in natural language processing and computational linguistics. The paper proposes an unsupervised method for this task, which involves clustering texts based on their linguistic features and then using a voting scheme to determine the correct labels for the clusters. This method is likely to be of interest to researchers working in several sub-fields of computer science, including computational linguistics (cs.CL), machine learning (cs.LG), information retrieval (cs.IR), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and deep learning (cs.DL).
